title: Near-infrared driven photocatalytic hydrogen production from ammonia borane hydrolysis using heterostructure-upconverted nanoparticles
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01047G, Paper
Bushra Maryam, Asim Muhammad, Hamna Qayyum, Lun Pan, Ji-Jun Zou, Xianhua Liu
This study presents a novel approach to hydrogen evolution through ammonia borane dehydrogenation, utilizing the unique properties of upconverted nanoparticles (UCNPs) and safe, abundant near-infrared (NIR) light. By converting low-energy...
